title: Katy Perry debuted striking blonde locks over the weekend and you’ll barely recognize her
text:
Katy Perry debuted striking blonde locks over the weekend and you’ll barely recognize her Well, this is different! Singer Katy Perry debuted blonde locks over the weekend and she looks completely different.
The “Dark Horse” singer is known for her bold beauty changes and ability to rock any hair color and this new shade of blonde is no different.
On Saturday, Perry attended the unveiling of friend and artist, Sham Ibrahim’s new Donald Trump art piece in Palm Springs, California.
She had a surprise unveiling of her own, as she sported fiercely blonde short locks. Tara Ziemba/Getty Images The 32-year-old singer also went makeup-free at the event and we love her even more for it. It looks like Perry was touched by a citrus fairy, which we’re totally into. 
Tara Ziemba/Getty Images Perry’s hair color is giving us major flashbacks to her ’50s themed birthday party a few months ago.
Sure her yellow updo didn’t last long, but it was bright and bold, which we loved. RYDELL HIGH MEETS HUNGER GAMES 
A photo posted by Derek Blasberg (@derekblasberg) on Oct 30, 2016 at 12:38pm PDT 
Later on Saturday, the “Roar” singer showed off her new, and very real, hair color at her boyfriend, Orlando Bloom’s surprise 40th birthday bash.
Bloom has been rocking blonde locks as well lately, so the couple matched as they celebrated his big day. Perry even flew in the Pirates of the Caribbean actor’s mom for the weekend, which is adorable.
PS: there were onesies being worn throughout the night that featured the actor’s face on them that we still can’t get over.
